item.title: Advent of Code 2021 Day 5: Hydrothermal Venture
item.description: Helping Santa’s submarine avoid dangerous clusters of hydrothermal vents using a line drawing algorithm.

item.title: Advent of Code 2021 Day 4: Giant Squid
item.description: Implementing the bingo subsystem for Santa’s submarine.

item.title: Mermaid graphs in Obsidian and Hugo
item.description: How to render graphs in both Obsidian and Hugo using the same input file.

item.title: Obsidian Cheat Sheet
item.description: Hotkeys, tips and tricks for the note taking software Obsidian.

item.title: Advent of Code 2021 Day 3: Binary Diagnostic
item.description: Or how to solve a bitwise operations problem using strings.

item.title: Advent of Code 2021 Day 1: Sonar Sweep
Advent of Code 2021
item.description: It’s happening! Finally December is here, and a new Advent of Code begins. I’ll try to write a very short post for each of my solutions.
